|brand = DongShanPi |model = Seven |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Development Board |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = development board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AC7Z-ESPC3WROOM |icid = 21098-ESPC3WROOM |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = STMicro;STM32MP157D; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type2 = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |armrev12 = Cortex-M4 |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- undocumented --> |cpu1spd2 = 209 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC 5.1 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kioxia;THGBMDG5D1LBAIL; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K128M16JT-125:K; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8035-A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2020.01;stm32mp-r1; |stockos = Linux;5.4.31;Buildroot;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slots, Micro SIM Card slot |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 5 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB (Type C) Female
|serial = yes,, console,, USB Female (Type-C),, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slots, Micro SIM Card slot, RGB LCD FPC, MIPI DSI, RTC w/ battery, CAN Bus, RS485, I2C, SPI, UART, GPIO+ |addchip = 4-port USB Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2514B;;1;,,, High-speed CAN Transceiver w/ Standby Mode;NXP;TJA1042;;1;,,, Programmable USB Type-C Controller w/ PD;ON Semi;FUSB302;;1;,,, USB to High Speed Serial Port Chip;Nanjing Qinheng Micro;CH9102F;;1;,,, 3.3V Low Power Half-Duplex RS-485 Transceiver;MaxLinear;SP3485;;1;,,, Ultra Low Capacitance TVS Diode Array;Leiditech;ULC0544P10;;2;,,, 1.5MHz 2A Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SM8082A;;1;,,, 5V 1A USB Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280AAC;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/13/2022 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf =
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Espressif ESP32-C3-WROOM-02 |rad1modif = USB/UART |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Espressif;ESP32-C3; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = integrated |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[STMicro]] STM32MP157DAC :Dual-core ARM (Cortex A-7) @800MHz :+ ARM (Cortex-M4) @209MHz *GPU: Vivante (OpenGL ES2.0) *Storage: 4GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gbe LAN ports *Wi-Fi: [[Espressif]] ESP32C3 RISCV :802.11bgn 1T1R (2.4GHz) + BT 5.0 *USB: 1x USB Type-C (Host), 4x USB 2.0 ports *PCI: 1x Mini PCIe (USB Only) *Power Source: USB Female Type-C
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:DongShanPi Seven SOM Top.jpeg|SoM Top File:DongShanPi Seven SOM Bottom.jpeg|Som Bottom File:DongShanPi Seven Carrier Top.jpeg|Carrier Top File:DongShanPi Seven Carrier Bottom.jpeg|Carrier Bottom File:DongShanPi Seven Top.jpeg|Board Top </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
